term.description: The result of hair length prediction

SkinSmoothEffect.description: Controls the AI-generated smoothing applied to the skin. If no skin_smooth effect is provided, the system will automatically apply a smoothing strength of 50 for realistic blending.

category.description: Identifies this effect as a skin smoothing effect. Must always be "skin_smooth".

skinSmoothStrength.description: Strength of smoothing applied to overall skin texture. Higher values result in softer, more airbrushed skin appearance.

skinSmoothColorIntensity.description: Intensity of color blending applied during smoothing. Helps unify skin tones and reduce color inconsistency.

BlushEffect.description: Applies blush to the cheeks using predefined patterns and customizable color palettes. Pattern names must correspond to labels from the official blush.json pattern catalog.

category.description: Identifies this effect as a blush effect. Must always be "blush".

pattern.description: Defines how the blush is placed on the face. Each pattern corresponds to a face shape and layout from blush.json.

name.description: Name of the blush pattern. Must be equal to a `label` from the blush.json pattern catalog.

palettes.description: List of color palette entries. The number of palettes required depends on the `colorNum` field defined in the selected blush pattern.

color.description: Primary blush color in hex format (#RRGGBB). Used as the dominant pigment for the blush application.

texture.description:
Texture of the blush:
  - matte: pure pigment, no shine
  - satin: soft glow, requires glowStrength
  - shimmer: sparkly or luminous, requires shimmer parameters

glowStrength.description: Glow intensity for satin blush textures. Required when texture = "satin" or "shimmer".

shimmerColor.description: Color of shimmer particles. Required when texture = "shimmer".

shimmerDensity.description: Density of shimmer particles in the blush application. Required when texture = "shimmer".

colorIntensity.description: Strength of the blush color relative to the base pigment.

BronzerEffect.description: Applies bronzer to warm up skin tone and add sun-kissed contours. Pattern names must match bronzer.json entries.

category.description: Identifies this effect as a bronzer effect. Must always be "bronzer".

pattern.description: Defines the bronzer application layout. Pattern name must match a `label` in bronzer.json.

name.description: Name of the bronzer pattern from the bronzer.json catalog.

palettes.description: The bronzer palette contains pigment color and intensity controls.

ConcealerEffect.description: Adds concealer for neutralizing blemishes, evening skin tone, and brightening under-eye regions. Concealer does not use a pattern — only pigment and intensity controls. All palette fields are required to ensure consistent behavior across face zones.

category.description: Identifies this effect as a concealer effect. Must always be "concealer".

palettes.description: One or more concealer palettes defining color and intensity properties. The same palette is applied to relevant facial areas, such as under-eye, forehead, and chin correction zones.

color.description: Concealer shade in hex RGB format (#RRGGBB). Should typically match or slightly brighten the skin tone.

colorIntensity.description: General concealer pigmentation strength applied across the face.

colorUnderEyeIntensity.description: Specific pigmentation control for the under-eye region. Helps brighten dark circles without over-applying to other zones.

coverageLevel.description: Determines opacity of concealer coverage. Higher values hide more discoloration or blemishes.

ContourEffect.description: Defines contouring for facial sculpting using patterns tailored to specific face shapes. Contour patterns determine highlight/shadow placement, while palettes control the contour shade.

category.description: Identifies this effect as a contour effect. Must always be "contour".

pattern.description: Defines where contour shadowing is applied on the face. Must use a pattern name defined in contour.json (e.g., HeartFace2, OvalFace6).

name.description: Name of the contour pattern. Must be equal to a `label` from contour.json.

palettes.description: Defines the pigment used for contouring. Usually a cool-tone or neutral shade darker than foundation.

color.description: Contour pigment color in #RRGGBB hex format.

colorIntensity.description: Strength of contour pigmentation. Higher values result in deeper shadows.

EyebrowsEffect.description: Shapes and colors the eyebrows using customizable geometry and color palettes. When `pattern.type = shape`, the pattern defines the brow geometry (arch, curvature, thickness). When `pattern.type = color`, only pigment changes are applied.

category.description: Identifies this effect as an eyebrow styling effect. Must always be "eyebrows".

pattern.description: This setting defines the eyebrow pattern mode, which can either adjust the shape or apply color only, and the pattern names must match the labels in eyebrows.json.

type.description: Specifies whether eyebrow styling modifies brow shape or only pigment. Default is shape-based modification.

name.description: Name of the eyebrow shape or color pattern. Must match a `label` from eyebrows.json.

curvature.description: Adjusts how curved the brow is. Negative = flatter / straighter, positive = more curved.

thickness.description: Controls eyebrow thickness adjustment relative to the detected brow. Positive = thicker, negative = thinner.

definition.description: Sharpness and clarity of the brows. Higher values increase brow edge definition for a cleaner look.

palettes.description: Eyebrow color palettes. Each palette controls pigment and optional shimmer effects (for shimmer textures only).

colorIntensity.description: Pigmentation strength used when applying eyebrow color.

texture.description: Brow pigment texture style. Shimmer adds reflective highlights to brow hairs.

shimmerColor.description: Shimmer color applied when texture = shimmer.

shimmerIntensity.description: Strength of shimmer glow. Required only if texture = shimmer.

shimmerSize.description: Size of shimmer particles. Required for shimmer textures.

shimmerDensity.description: Density of shimmer particles in the brow. Required for shimmer textures.

EyelinerEffect.description: Applies eyeliner using customizable patterns and pigment settings. Patterns define the eyeliner layout (e.g., Arabic shapes, winged styles), while palettes specify color, texture, shimmer/metallic effects, and intensity.

category.description: Identifies this effect as an eyeliner effect. Must always be "eye_liner".

pattern.description: Defines the eyeliner shape and placement. Pattern names must match labels from eyeliner.json.

name.description: Name of the eyeliner pattern. Must be equal to a label from eyeliner.json.

palettes.description: Eyeliner color palette entries. Each palette controls pigment color, shimmer/metallic effects, and overall intensity. More palettes are used when the selected eyeliner pattern requires multiple colors.

texture.description: Eyeliner texture finish specifies the look of the liner, whether it's matte for a flat opaque effect, shimmer for a sparkling reflective finish (with shimmer fields), or metallic for a glossy metallic sheen (requiring shimmer fields and metallic intensity).

shimmerColor.description: Color used for shimmer or metallic reflective particles. Required if texture is shimmer or metallic.

shimmerIntensity.description: Strength of reflective sparkle. Required when texture is shimmer or metallic.

metallicIntensity.description: Metallic reflectivity level. Required when texture = metallic.

colorIntensity.description: Pigmentation strength for the eyeliner color.

EyeshadowEffect.description: Applies eyeshadow with customizable multi-color palettes and textures. Eyeshadow patterns define layout (e.g., 1 to 5 colors), while palettes specify pigmentation and shimmer/metallic properties.

category.description: Identifies this effect as an eyeshadow effect. Must always be "eye_shadow".

pattern.description: Defines the eyeshadow placement pattern. Must match a `label` in eyeshadow.json (e.g., 1color1, 2colors1, etc.).

name.description: Pattern name from eyeshadow.json determining number of colors and shadow placement zones.

palettes.description: One or more pigment palette entries. The number of palettes required depends on the pattern's `colorNum`. Each palette defines a specific layer/color in the eyeshadow pattern.

color.description: Eyeshadow pigment color in HEX format (#RRGGBB).

texture.description: Eyeshadow surface appearance determines whether the finish is matte for a smooth flat look, shimmer for a sparkling effect (requiring shimmer parameters), or metallic for a bold metallic sheen (requiring shimmer parameters and metallic intensity).

shimmerColor.description: Color of shimmer particles. Required if texture = shimmer or metallic.

shimmerIntensity.description: Reflective sparkle strength for shimmer or metallic textures.

metallicIntensity.description: Metallic reflectivity level; required for metallic textures.

colorIntensity.description: Overall pigmentation level of each shadow color.

EyelashesEffect.description: Enhances eyelashes by applying pigment to detected lash strands. Lash extensions or density enhancements depend on the selected pattern, while the palette controls lash color and intensity.

category.description: Identifies this effect as an eyelashes effect. Must always be "eyelashes".

pattern.description: Defines which eyelash style is applied (natural, artistic, winged, upper/lower, etc.). Must match a `label` from eyelashes.json.

name.description: Name of the eyelash pattern from eyelashes.json.

palettes.description: Eyelash color palettes. Eyelashes do not support shimmer/metallic effects — only color and intensity.

colorIntensity.description: Darkness/pigment strength applied to the lashes.

FoundationEffect.description: Applies foundation to even skin tone using pigment, coverage, and glow controls. Unlike blush/contour, foundation has no pattern — it is applied globally based on skin segmentation.

category.description: Identifies this effect as a foundation effect. Must always be "foundation".

palettes.description: Foundation palette entries controlling tone, coverage, glow, and color intensity.

color.description: Foundation shade in #RRGGBB format. Typically close to natural skin tone.

glowIntensity.description: Adds luminosity to the skin finish. Higher values produce a radiant or dewy effect.

coverageIntensity.description: Controls opacity of foundation coverage. Higher values hide more imperfections.

HighlighterEffect.description: Adds reflective highlights to the high points of the face (cheekbones, cupid's bow, nose bridge, etc.). Patterns determine highlight placement based on face shape. Palettes control shimmer, glow, density, particle size, and coloration.

category.description: Identifies this effect as a highlighter effect. Must always be "highlighter".

pattern.description: Highlight placement pattern. Must match a `label` from highlighter.json (e.g., HeartFace4, Oblong11, OvalFace2).

name.description: Name of the highlight pattern from the highlighter.json catalog.

palettes.description: Highlighter palette entries defining shimmer, glow, density, and color.

color.description: Highlighter pigment color in #RRGGBB HEX format. Usually white, champagne, gold, or pink tones.

glowIntensity.description: Amount of non-shimmer glow added to the skin. Higher values result in a more luminous, radiant finish.

shimmerIntensity.description: Strength of shimmer reflections. Higher values = more sparkle.

shimmerDensity.description: Number of shimmer particles per area. Higher density creates a more glittery effect.

shimmerSize.description: Size of shimmer particles. Larger particles create a glitter-like effect; small = fine shimmer.

colorIntensity.description: Strength of the highlighter color pigment.

LipColorEffect.description: Applies lipstick in a variety of shapes, finishes, and artistic styles. Includes control over lip morphology (fullness, wrinkles), texture (matte, gloss, metallic, shimmer, sheer, etc.), shimmer/gloss parameters, multi-color patterns, and ombre/two-tone styles.

category.description: Identifies this effect as a lipstick/lip color effect. Must always be "lip_color".

shape.description: Defines the lip boundary and shape modification. Pattern names must match lipshape.json (e.g., plump, original, pouty).

name.description: Lip shape style used to modify the lip edges and silhouette. Must be equal to a `label` from lipshape.json.

morphology.description: Optional morphological adjustments to lips. Enhances fullness and reduces lip wrinkles.

fullness.description: Controls how plump or full the lips appear. Higher values = larger, more voluminous lips.

wrinkless.description: Smooths wrinkles and texture on the lips. Higher values result in smoother lip appearance.

palettes.description: Lip color palette entries controlling pigment, texture, shimmer, and gloss. Multiple palettes can be used for ombre or two-tone styles.

texture.description: This setting tells you the texture of lip finish. If you choose gloss, make sure to include gloss properties. For shimmer, metallic or holographic finishes, add the shimmer-related fields. And if you go for sheer, shimmer or gloss, don't forget to include transparency intensity.

shimmerColor.description: Color of shimmer particles for shimmer, metallic, or holographic textures.

transparencyIntensity.description: Transparency effect strength. Used for sheer, shimmer, or gloss textures.

style.description: Styles describe the artistic look of lip colour, whether it's a full uniform shade, an ombre gradient blending tones, or a two-tone effect with contrasting colors on different parts of the lips.

innerColorRatio.description: Determines how far inward the secondary color extends (ombre only). Required if type = ombre.

blendStrength.description: Blending softness between colors. Required if type = ombre.

LipLinerEffect.description: Applies lip liner around the edges of the lips, enhancing shape definition. Useful for refining lip borders, adjusting symmetry, and supporting ombre/two-tone looks.

category.description: Identifies this effect as a lip liner effect. Must always be "lip_liner".

pattern.description: Defines lip liner placement based on pattern from lipliner.json.

name.description: Name of lip liner pattern (e.g., Natural1, LargerUpper1).

palettes.description: Lip liner palette entries defining color, thickness, and smoothness.

color.description: Lip liner pigment color in HEX format.

thickness.description: Thickness of the lip liner stroke — higher values create bolder outlines.

smoothness.description: Smoothness of the stroke edges. Higher values produce softer, blended lines.

NoContent.description: Request was successful but there is no response body

BadRequest.description: Can not process the request due to client error

error_code.description:
Error code:
  * BadRequest - Unexpected request parameters or body

Error code:
  * InvalidTaskId - Invalid task id

error.example: The operation could not be completed

error_code.description:
Error code:
  * InvalidParameters - Invalid request parameters or body

BadRequestAndInvalidParameters.description: Can not process the request due to client error or invalid request parameters

error.example: The operation could not be completed

error_code.description:
Error code:
  * BadRequest - Unexpected request parameters or body
  * InvalidParameters - Invalid request parameters or body

Unauthorized.description: Authentication failed or user does not have necessary permissions

error_code.description:
Error code:
  * InvalidAccessToken - Access token is not given or not valid

InvalidApiKey.description: Invalid API Key or Inactice API Key or Expired API Key

error_code.description:
Error code:
  * InvalidApiKey - API Key is not given or not valid
  * InactiveApiKey - API Key is inactivated
  * ExpiredApiKey - API Key is expired

error.example: The operation could not be completed

error_code.description:
Error code:
  * CreditInsufficiency - Insufficient unit to run
  * BadRequest - Unexpected request parameter
  * InvalidStyleGroup - Invalid style group id
  * InvalidStyle - Invalid style id
  * InvalidParameters - Invalid request parameters

Forbidden.description: User does not have necessary permissions for the resource

TooManyRequests.description: Too many requests within a given amount of time

InternalServerError.description: Unexpected error occurred on the server

TaskTimeout.description: The task has no response in the expected time

error_code.description:
Error code:
  * TaskTimeout - The task has no response in the expected time

StyleResponse_V1.1.description: Successful retrieval of category and its styles

BearerAuthentication.description: Use the `access_token` obtained from authentication and pass it in header: `Authorization:Bearer <access_token>`

BearerAuthenticationV2.description: Use the standard 'Bearer authentication'. Put your 'API Key'(so called 'client_id' in V1 authentication) in header: `Authorization:Bearer <API Key>`. Notice that there is ' ' a space between 'Bearer' and the '<API Key>'.

id.description: A unique identifier for this resource.
